text_snack_mustbenum: Dole ne tazara ta zama lamba!
text_importexport_content: Anan zaku iya shigo da fitar da masu tuni.
text_error_loadfile: kuskure: ba zai iya ɗaukar fayil ba.
text_error_fileformat: kuskure: tsarin fayil ba daidai bane
text_notifications1: Dole ne a kunna sanarwar don amfani da wannan aikace-aikacen:
text_help_content1: Tunatarwa game da aikace-aikace aikace-aikace ne wanda ke aiko da sanarwa a wani lokaci da aka ayyana.
text_help_content2: Don ƙara sabon tunatarwa, latsa gunkin "ƙari". Bayan haka, shirya filayen rubutu kuma saka taken sanarwar, tazara (a cikin sakanni), rubutun da zai ƙunsa a jikin sanarwar, da URL ɗin gunkin.
text_help_content3: Lokacin da aikace-aikacen ke gudana a cikin mai bincike, to mai bincike zai iya kashe sanarwar idan ba a buɗe aikin a cikin shafin aiki ba. Idan an shigar da aikin, na'urarka zata iya dakatar da aikin, musamman idan batirin na'urarka tayi kasa. Don haka, yi amfani da wannan aikin idan zai iya taimaka muku, amma kar a yi amfani da shi don kowane abu mai mahimmanci.
text_help_content4: A cikin menu na saiti zaka iya canza yaren mai amfani da mai amfani.
text_help_content5: Don shigowa ko fitarwa masu tuni, latsa gunkin shigowa / fitarwa. Lokacin shigo da masu tuni daga fayil, za a share masu tuni kuma a sake rubuta su.
text_help_content6: Tunatarwa game da Looping shine Aikace-aikacen Yanar Gizon Ci Gaban, wanda ke nufin yana gudana a cikin mai bincike. Lokacin da ka girka shi, yayin da ba a nuna abubuwan binciken ba, har yanzu yana gudana a cikin mai bincike. Ana adana masu tuni a cikin yankin bincike na gida mai bincike don yankin yankin mai tuni.marcoparrone.github.io. LocalStorage na aiki lafiya tare da masu bincike na Chrome, Edge da Firefox. Wasu masu bincike zasu iya shareShagon gida bayan wani lokaci. Android ta tsoho yana amfani da Chrome, Windows ta tsoho yana amfani da Edge. Neman Tunatarwa ta Buga a halin yanzu baya tallafawa kan samfuran Apple. Tare da manufar taimakawa don hana asarar masu tuni, ana ba da shawarar yin ajiyar ajiya ta amfani da aikin "fitarwa", duk lokacin da kuka yi wasu gyare-gyare waɗanda ba ku son rasawa.
text_about_content3: AN BAYAR DA SOFTWARE "KAMAR YADDA", BA TARE DA GARANTIN KOWANE IRIN, MAGANA KO AIKI BA, HAR DA BAYA KASANCEWA DA GASKIYAR SANA'AR SAMUN HALITTA, KYAUTA A WAJEN SANA'A DA RASHIN YIN RASHI. BABU WANI ABU DA ZAI YI WA MALAMAI KO MASU KWADAYI A CIKIN KWADAYI DUK WANI LAIFI, LALACEWA KO SAURAN LAYYA, KO A HANYAR KWAQIQI, TAUYA KO WATA, DA TA FITO DAGA, WAJANTA KO TA HADAWA DA SOFTWARE KO AMFANI KO SAURAN MAGANA SOFTWARE.
text_about_content4: WANNAN HIDIMAR NA KUNSAN FASSARA DA GOOGLE YAYI MAKA. GOOGLE YAYI FADAR DUK WATA GARDADI DANGANE DA FASSARA, FAHIMCI KO AIKI, HAR DA KOWANE GARANTI NA KASANCEWA, AMINCI, DA KOWANE GARANTI NA HARKAR MAGANA, KYAUTA A BANGAREN NUFIN DA NON.
text_about_content5: An fassara wannan ƙa'idodin yanar gizon don saukakawarku ta amfani da software na fassarar da Google Translate ke bayarwa. Anyi ƙoƙari mai ma'ana don samar da ingantacciyar fassara, kodayake, babu fassarar atomatik mai kyau kuma ba ana nufin maye gurbin masu fassarar ɗan adam ba. An bayar da fassarori a matsayin sabis ga masu amfani da gidan yanar gizon marcoparrone.github.io, kuma ana bayar da su "kamar yadda yake." Babu wani garantin kowane iri, ko dai an bayyana ko a bayyane, da aka yi game da daidaito, aminci, ko daidaito na duk fassarar da aka yi daga Ingilishi zuwa kowane yare. Wasu abubuwan ciki (kamar su hotuna, bidiyo, Filashi, da sauransu) maiyuwa baza a fassara su daidai ba saboda iyakance software na fassarar.
text_about_content6: Rubutun aikin hukuma shine shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi. Duk wani bambancin ra'ayi ko bambance-bambance da aka kirkira a cikin fassarar ba abin ɗaurawa bane kuma ba shi da wani tasiri na doka don bin doka ko dalilai na tilastawa. Idan wasu tambayoyi sun taso dangane da daidaiton bayanin da ke cikin gidan yanar gizon da aka fassara, koma zuwa shafin yanar gizon Ingilishi wanda shine fasalin hukuma.
